AT.name: Wild Gunman
AT.description: Hast du das Zeug dazu, der schnellste Schütze im wilden Westen zu werden? In Wild Gunman trittst du gegen blitzschnell ziehende Gesetzlose an, um zu sehen, ob du dich in Schnelligkeit und Zielgenauigkeit mit ihnen messen kannst. Ursprünglich ein Spiel für den NES™-Zapper, kannst du nun die Wii-Fernbedienung zum Zielen und Schießen benutzen. Pass nur auf, dass deine Gegner nicht schneller sind. In drei verschiedenen Spielmodi kannst du gegen einen Gesetzlosen, zwei gleichzeitig oder gleich eine ganze Bande antreten. Du wirst einen kühlen Kopf und einen ruhigen Finger am Abzug brauchen, um diesen Schurken zu zeigen, wer am schnellsten ziehen kann. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Wild Gunman
AU.description: Do you have what it takes to be the fastest gun in the West? Wild Gunman pits you against quick-drawing outlaws to see if you can beat them with speed and accuracy. Originally for NES™ using the Zapper light gun, you now use the Wii Remote™ to take aim and fire before your opponent does. Three game modes let you take on one outlaw, or two at the same time, or a whole gang of them. Keep a cool head and a steady trigger finger, and show those outlaws who’s the quickest on the draw. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Wild Gunman
BG.description: Do you have what it takes to be the fastest gun in the West? Wild Gunman pits you against quick-drawing outlaws to see if you can beat them with speed and accuracy. Originally for NES™ using the Zapper light gun, you now use the Wii Remote™ to take aim and fire before your opponent does. Three game modes let you take on one outlaw, or two at the same time, or a whole gang of them. Keep a cool head and a steady trigger finger, and show those outlaws who’s the quickest on the draw. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Wild Gunman
BE.description: Pensez-vous être à la hauteur pour remporter le titre de tireur le plus rapide de l'Ouest ? Wild Gunman vous met au défi d'affronter les bandits les plus vifs pour déterminer qui est le meilleur tireur. Initialement développé pour le NES™ Zapper, vous pouvez maintenant utiliser la télécommande Wii pour dégainer et tirer avant vos adversaires. Trois modes de jeu vous permettent d'affronter un ou deux bandits, ou tout un gang à la fois. Gardez votre sang froid et une main ferme pour montrer à ces bandits qui est le véritable as de la gâchette. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Wild Gunman
ES.description: ¿Tienes lo que hay que tener para ser el pistolero más rápido del oeste? En Wild Gunman tendrás que enfrentarte a los forajidos más rápidos y demostrar que puedes superarles en velocidad y precisión. En este juego, originalmente lanzado para NES™ y compatible con la pistola de luz Zapper, utilizarás el mando de Wii para apuntar y disparar antes que tu oponente. A lo largo de tres modos de juego, podrás enfrentarte a un solo forajido, a dos a la vez o a una banda entera. Mantén la calma, aprieta el gatillo con decisión y demuestra a estos delincuentes quién es el más rápido. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Wild Gunman
IT.description: Credi davvero di essere il pistolero più veloce del West? Wild Gunman ti metterà di fronte i banditi più lesti per testare se riesci a batterli con velocità e precisione. Originariamente un titolo per NES™ Zapper, adesso puoi usare il telecomando Wii per mirare e sparare prima dei tuoi avversari. Tre modalità di gioco ti permetteranno di affrontare uno o due banditi alla volta, oppure un'intera banda. Mantieni il sangue freddo e il dito sul grilletto e mostra a quei farabutti chi è il pistolero più letale. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

LT.description: Do you have what it takes to be the fastest gun in the West? Wild Gunman pits you against quick-drawing outlaws to see if you can beat them with speed and accuracy. Originally for NES™ using the Zapper light gun, you now use the Wii Remote™ to take aim and fire before your opponent does. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Wild Gunman
NL.description: Heb jij het in je om de snelste schutter van het Wilde Westen te worden? In Wild Gunman neem je het op tegen bandieten met vlugge vingers en probeer je ze te verslaan met snelheid en precisie. Oorspronkelijk ontwikkeld voor gebruik met het Zapper lichtgeweer op de NES™, nu kun je de Wii-afstandsbediening gebruiken om je tegenstander te snel af te zijn. Drie spelstanden geven je de mogelijkheid om het tegen een bandiet op te nemen, of twee tegelijkertijd, of een hele bende. Houd je hoofd koel, zet je vinger schrap en laat die bandieten zien wie sneller kan schieten dan zijn schaduw. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Wild Gunman
NZ.description: Do you have what it takes to be the fastest gun in the West? Wild Gunman pits you against quick-drawing outlaws to see if you can beat them with speed and accuracy. Originally for NES™ using the Zapper light gun, you now use the Wii Remote™ to take aim and fire before your opponent does. Three game modes let you take on one outlaw, or two at the same time, or a whole gang of them. Keep a cool head and a steady trigger finger, and show those outlaws who’s the quickest on the draw. This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: Wild Gunman
PL.description: Do you have what it takes to be the fastest gun in the West? Wild Gunman pits you against quick-drawing outlaws to see if you can beat them with speed and accuracy. Originally for NES™ using the Zapper light gun, you now use the Wii Remote™ to take aim and fire before your opponent does. Three game modes let you take on one outlaw, or two at the same time, or a whole gang of them. Keep a cool head and a steady trigger finger, and show those outlaws who’s the quickest on the draw. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Wild Gunman
PT.description: Será que consegues ser o pistoleiro mais rápido do Velho Oeste? Em Wild Gunman, competes contra foras-da-lei rápidos no gatilho e tentas vencê-los em velocidade e precisão. Foi lançado originalmente para a NES™ para jogar com a pistola de raios Zapper, mas agora podes utilizar o Comando Wii para fazer pontaria e disparar antes do teu adversário. Há três modos de jogo em que podes enfrentar um fora-da-lei, ou dois ao mesmo tempo, ou até mesmo um bando. Mantém a cabeça fria e o dedo firme e mostra a esses foras-da-lei quem é o mais rápido a sacar a pistola. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Wild Gunman
RU.description: Достойны ли вы звания самого ловкого стрелка на Диком Западе? Wild Gunman бросает вам вызов в виде быстрых на руку преступников, соревнующихся с вами в скорости и точности стрельбы. Для изначальной версии игры для системы NES™ использовался лазерный пистолет Zapper, теперь же вы можете использовать пульт Wii, чтобы прицелиться и выстрелить в вашего соперника первым. В трех разных режимах игры вы можете бросать вызов одному, двум и даже целой шайке бандитов. Оставайтесь сосредоточенными, держите палец на курке и покажите этим преступникам кто лучший стрелок в округе! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.name: Wild Gunman
SE.description: Do you have what it takes to be the fastest gun in the West? Wild Gunman pits you against quick-drawing outlaws to see if you can beat them with speed and accuracy. Originally for NES™ using the Zapper light gun, you now use the Wii Remote™ to take aim and fire before your opponent does.
